short_summary: Procurement of office furniture in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement. Open to bidders who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders.
description: This contract comprises the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Mont-Joli, Quebec by desired date of March 1, 2023. The contract requirement exceeds the delegated purchasing authority of the Department. The procurement method for this contract is open to suppliers who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders. The previous change notice was added on November 11, 2022.
tags: Procurement Category: Goods, Procurement Method: Open to bidders who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders.
location: Quebec, office furniture, Tender Closing Date: November 21, 2022
Procurement Method: Open to bidders who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders.
full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement:**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Reference Number:** 30003596

**Issuing Agency:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Contact Information:**

*   Marius Lacasse, Contract Officer
*   [marius.lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:marius.lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
*   200 Kent Street, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada

**Tender Description:**

This tender is issued pursuant to the Standing Offer (SO) E60PQ-140003/C, which covers a requirement from Product Categories 1A, 1B, 2, 3, and 5 of the said SO. The successful bidder will be required to provide office furniture to Fisheries and Oceans Canada in Mont-Joli, Quebec, by March 1, 2023.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Eligibility:**

Suppliers who have a valid Standing Offer (SO) from the above-mentioned SO may bid on this tender. Suppliers who do not have an SO must first qualify for an SO through the General Stream of Suppliers (SA) process, as outlined in RFSA # E60PQ-140003/C.

**Key Dates:**

*   Tender Closing Date: November 21, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
*   Amendment Date: November 16, 2022
*   Expected Contract Start Date: March 1, 2023 (TBD)
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 1, 2023 (TBD)

**Attachments:**

Please refer to the following documents for detailed tender information:

*   [Annex E - Request for Proposal - Eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/4042689169403bc01b26d22c0dd53620/30003596_-achat_mobilier_plan.pdf)
*   [Annex E - Request for Proposal - Fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/202
